name: Tag Linked Work Items
description: Automatically add specified tag to all work items associated with build or release
author: Artem Sergeev

inputs.name: pipelineType
inputs.label: Specify type of pipeline
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify whether task is used for build or release

inputs.name: tagToAdd
inputs.label: Tag to add to work items
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a tag that will be added to work items

inputs.name: workItemArea
inputs.label: Area for filtering tasks for tagging
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify a value of an area field of work item to filter work items for tagging 

 If doesn't specified tagging will be applied to all work items
